ResearchProjectDef.label: MD2 Droids
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the Droid Assembly. This is a workbench which is where all your droids will be constructed. Initially it will not have any recipes available - these are unlocked through further research options

ResearchProjectDef.label: MD2 Droid Charge Pad
ResearchProjectDef.description:
--REQUIRED BEFORE YOU CAN RESEARCH DROIDS--
Unlocks building the Droid Charging Pad, which will charge droids standing on it. Unlocks research options for droids.

ResearchProjectDef.label: MD2 Droid Repair Station
ResearchProjectDef.description: This allows you to build the droid repair station, which is used to repair droids when they are damaged. It requires power to operate and will repair normal damages automatically. To repair missing parts, you must build a repair station supplier next to the repair station and supply it with steel. Each missing part takes 10 steel to replace.

ResearchProjectDef.label: MD2 Worker Droid
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the worker droid to be available for construction at the Droid Assembly. This droid cleans your base and hauls things around.

ResearchProjectDef.label: MD2 Mining Droid
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the mining droid to be available for construction at the Droid Assembly. This droid is capable of quickly mining through stone.

ResearchProjectDef.label: MD2 Grower Droid
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the grower droid to be available for construction at the Droid Assembly. This droid is capable of quickly planting and harvesting plants.

ResearchProjectDef.label: MD2 Medic Droid
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the medic droid to be available for construction at the Droid Assembly. This droid is proficient at treating patients.

ResearchProjectDef.label: MD2 Builder Droid
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the builder droid to be available for construction at the Droid Assembly. This droid is proficient at constructing buildings.

ResearchProjectDef.label: MD2 Crafting Droid
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the crafting droid to be available for construction at the Droid Assembly. This droid is proficient at crafting.

ResearchProjectDef.label: MD2 Cooking Droid
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the cooking droid to be available for construction at the Droid Assembly. This droid is an excellent chef.

ResearchProjectDef.label: MD2 Basic Combat Droid
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the basic combat droid to be available for construction at the Droid Assembly. This droid is the first succesful combat droid to be manufactured, being that it did not attempt to kill your colonists upon completion.

ResearchProjectDef.label: MD2 Crematorius
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the crematorius to be available for construction at the Droid Assembly. This droid is a hulking construct which roams the battlefield after the fight and devours corpses. It can be set to strip or not strip bodies.
